content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. This game is not a pornographic product, so there are no scenes of coition.  The main function of the game is to solve puzzles. 
After completing level you take reward - the opportunity without censorship to enjoy the aesthetics of the beautiful female body created by artist in the style of "Nude (Art)" and Furry (Art). 
The all characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
